title: Beetle
description:
A green or brown beetle shown with antennae and six legs. Can be used to talk about beetles, bugs, or insects in general.

Not to be confused with ğŸ Lady Beetle, ğŸª³ Cockroach, ğŸ› Bug, ğŸœ Ant or other emoji representations of insects.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the beetle emoji is depicted as a charming and robust insect, rendered with a deep, lustrous emerald green shell that gleams under soft, realistic lighting, a hallmark of Apple's 3D design. Its segmented body and delicate antennae are sculpted with smooth rounded edges, giving it a friendly and approachable appearance. This little creature often symbolizes resilience, transformation, or a connection to nature, bringing a touch of the natural world to digital conversations on Apple devices.
